title: Chest Pain - 55-Year-Old Male
dispatch: You are responding to a 55-year-old male with chest pain. The scene is a quiet residential home. The patient is sitting upright on a couch, appears pale and diaphoretic.
scene_description: The patient is alert and oriented but appears pale and sweaty. He is clutching his chest and breathing rapidly. The living room is clean, there are no signs of trauma or hazards.
general_impression: 55-year-old male in mild distress, pale and diaphoretic
provocation: Worse with movement and deep breaths
radiation: Pain radiates to the left arm

sample.signs_symptoms: Chest pain, sweating, shortness of breath
sample.last_oral_intake: A sandwich and water about 2 hours ago
sample.events: Was mowing the lawn when chest pain began
